recipesJson.name: Charlie Nobles Smoked Yogurt
recipesJson.author: KylezKloudz
recipesJson.description:
Original recipe from Charlie Nobles Vaults. ðŸ¤« Described as "Sweet tobacco, velvety vanilla, layers of caramel, and twisted with a smooth yogurtâ€¦Sounds crazy, but vapes like a dream!"
I didn't do anything but throw it up on here...(Part of their not-so-discontinued series)
https://charlienoble.com/blogs/the-not-so-discontinued-series/charlie-noble-yogurts

reviews.text: This recipe is very old and not really designed to work with high voltage hardware... just too much of them tasty chemicals so I think lowering Yogurt to ~10% would work. Maybe I'm just sensitive though :)
